meanings.sent1: The desk was a mishmoshes of papers, pens, and books.
meanings.sent2: She tried to organize the mishmoshes of toys in the playroom.
meanings.sent3: The mishmoshes of colors in the painting made it look like a rainbow explosion.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were a mishmoshes of memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The mishmoshes of ingredients in the soup created a unique flavor.

meanings.definition: To mix or jumble together in a confused manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't mishmoshes the clean and dirty laundry together.
meanings.sent2: The kids mishmoshes their toys into one big pile.
meanings.sent3: He mishmoshes his words when he gets nervous.
meanings.sent4: The artist mishmoshes different art styles to create a new masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: She mishmoshes various spices to create a delicious dish.
